blocks.help_text: Please provide a brief summary of the results enclosed in your results registration document. This includes results of analyses set forth in the preregistration and results of any post hoc analyses.
blocks.example_text: Hypothesis #1 was confirmed: Navigation skill determines search strategy (p = 0.023). Hypothesis was not confirmed: H2 was not confirmed: Triage is more efficient before anticipated death of high value victims than after (p = .273).

blocks.help_text: Please provide a link to the study preregistration this study relies upon.
Please provide a link to the preregistration this results registration is following upon.
Please link to the datasets used in running your the preregistered plans/analyses.
blocks.example_text: The following datasets were used in running our preregistered analyses: https://console.cloud.google.com/XXXX

blocks.help_text: Please attach the file containing your hypothesis/capability preregistration and results.
